00002  * File: mthBOFlowEqnModel.h 
00003  * ------------------------- 
00004  * Header file for Black-Oil Flow Equation Model
00005  * 
00006  * Calculate accumulation terms

00010  * Modified by HPan in Feb. 2006 for separation of connection implementation
00011  *

00048
